narrative:
No non-compliant items at this inspection. Facility may be licensed as a class A dealer upon receipt of payment
to: USDA, APHIS, AC at AERO Suite 200, 920 Main Campus Drive in Raleigh, NC 27606. No regulated activities
may be conducted until a USDA license is issued. An exit briefing was conducted with the owner.
